      • createArchive

        private void createArchive​(java.lang.String archiveName,
                           ConfigObject config,
                           java.lang.String storageLocation)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           java.lang.InterruptedException,
                           NoValidDataException
        This method is used to create an archive with provided archive name. It uses the configuration file to retrieve
        included and excluded paths even if the backup is run manually. By default, if the user wants to back up all files
        from the remote server, the source directory has to be in included lists containing /* wildcard
        Parameters:
        archiveName - The name of the archive that is created
        config - The configuration file of given site
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        NoValidDataException

      • getArchiveNameByType

        private java.lang.String getArchiveNameByType​(java.lang.String type,
                                              ConfigObject config,
                                              java.lang.String siteName)
        This method creates the archive name based on the specification.
        Parameters:
        type - Defines the substring type in the final zip name that is stored on remote server
        config - The configuration file of given site
